Summary: i was coming out the back yard and saw it between 2 houses across street it sat there for a min.then it was gone.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming out the back yard and i looked across the street and there it was.Not above the trees but mid way between them there were no leaves on the trees so i saw it plain as day.It was 4pm so it was still daytime,it was octogan shaped with big red lights all the way around.and it was sitting still in the sky,no one else was around to show it to but i saw what i saw and its not the first time i saw one.i came into the house and called my husband to see if he saw it.He was at the store up the street,but it was already gone when he came out the store.I am a true believer we are not alone.then on april 20th me,my son and my mothr inlaw saw 12 objects in the sky they were bright stayed in the sky for awhile and then just disappeared.Now this time i had witnesses.well thats my story and i am glad i got to share it with someone.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around February 11th 2013
